title: Justice Weighs Legal Challenge to New York Granting Driver’s Licenses to Illegal Immigrants
text:
The U.S. Department of Justice is preparing to weigh in on a legal challenge to a New York state law that allows illegal immigrants to apply for a driver’s license.

Federal prosecutors asked a judge in a legal filing on Thursday for more time to consider their position on a federal lawsuit filed this summer by Erie County Clerk Michael Kearns, a Democrat who has also run for office on the Republican line.
